title: Godrej 190 L Direct Cool Single Door 5 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer and Intelligent Inverter Compressor  (Glass Blue, RD 1905 PTDI 53 GL BL)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Godrej
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Advanced Inverter Technology: The Advanced Inverter Technology regulates its operations intelligently by using the variable speed compressor. This results in noiseless operation, along with better durability and efficiency.
product_description.Large Vegetable Tray: This fridge comes with a large vegetable tray with up to 20 litres of storage space.

Overall I liked this product and seems to be well built quality and cooling well. Does quick freezing and keeps vegetables fresh. Has below issues in last 8 months of usage.

1. The defrosted water is used to cool the motor, good idea but comes with issue like it smells and you cant detach water collection tray to clean.

2. Motor assembly and placement of wires and metal cables are done poorly. It’s coming out. See the pic where tape is used to wrap the wire which is coming out. It does not looks Godrej has professionally designed this product and seems more workaround for design issue.

3. Door handle get looses too soon and there is no way to tight it.

4. The green light pops up once in a while continues causing panic and something wrong.
